message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While I'm open to negotiation, $9,500 is still below my acceptable range.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This reflects the value of the product and gives you a good price. What do you think?

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your position, but I'm still unable to meet at $11,000. I would like to propose $10,000 as a compromise. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while keeping within my budget.
